author: suat
msg: - After choosing service PIDs of Stores instead of their names as the name of revision tables, it is needed to put delimeters surrounding the table name. Considering this, I have adapted the SQL query strings in various classes.

author: stsp
msg: On the 1.6.x-testsuite-apr-hash-order branch, merge r1292507 from trunk.
Allows the svnsync tests to pass reliably with APR-1.4.6.
Conflict resolution was trivial, except for one change:
(DumpParser.get_props): Sort the list of properties parsed from
the dumpfile before returning. The code on trunk and 1.7 dumps
properties in sorted order (due to r966458) but 1.6 does not.
Instead of changing 1.6 behaviour it is better to make the

author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3989 - ActiveMQSslConnectionFactory.setKeyAndTrustManagers does not work with failover enabled - fix and test

author: suat
msg: -The methods in the RevisionManager interface does not take a Store parameter anymore. Instead, the identifiers of Stores are passed.
-ChangeSet interface does not have a dependency to the IndexingInterface anymore. This dependency is removed to prevent passing the actual IndexingSource instances to ChangeSet implementations.
